    • Method Detail

      • SystemSourceDataLine

        public static java.util.Optional<javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine> SystemSourceDataLine(javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat inputFormat)
        Helper Method for retrieving a line for the audio format of a audio data stream.. Used by FpSoundEngine to get the line of an audio Mixer to push input stream data to. See: FpSoundEngine.PlaySound(File)
        Parameters:
        inputFormat - The AudioFormat to retrieve a line for.
        Returns:
        Optional SourceDataLine for the AudioFormat, otherwise an empty optional (on LineUnavailableException).

      • LineDetails

        public static java.lang.String LineDetails(javax.sound.sampled.Line line)
        Get details for a line.
        Parameters:
        line - The Line to return details for.
        Returns:
        Line.Info as a String.
